name: Puzzle Series: Jigsaw Puzzle: Oden-kun
overview: A collection of jigsaw puzzles based pm Lily Franky's picture book The Adventure Of Oden Kun. series. The game has an Oden-kun's Story mode in which solving jigsaw puzzles advancing the story. There is also an Oden-kun Puzzle mode that focuses on solving jigsaws of characters from the story. "
